label: Station ID
description: Sequential number assigned to each record in the EWM_STATION table. Database unique identifier (key).

label: Site Code
description: Location based 18 character alphanumeric code assigned to each well. Database alternate unique identifier (key).

label: Local Well Name
description: Local well identification / local well name, number, or code

label: Water Level Measurement Method
description: Method used to measure water levels

label: Well Depth (feet bgs)
description: Total depth of well casing or well open borehole in feet below ground surface.

label: Well Use Type
description: Description of well use (Observation, Residential, etc.)

label: Well Completion Type
description: Single well, nested well, or other

label: WCR Number
description: DWR Well Completion Report Number (OSWCR Legacy Log Number)
